name: Bone To Be Rich
description:
Being a skeleton is not easy.  But living this fragile life doesn't mean that you have to be poor. You can get all the riches this world offers. You might break a couple of your bones along the way; but don't worry. You have lots of them.

-------- Gameplay --------

You start out this journey empty handed. Only thing you have is your fragile bones which gets dissolved when you miss your steps.

You try to finish a procedural grid with your careful or hasty movement. Depends on whether you speedrun it or not :)

You can fall, you can finish, you can do anything. 

In this world, as a skeleton, everything you do is appreciated. You can achieve things that normal people can't. Like falling from 10 km and be fine. Or feed the dogs with your own bones. Try everything :)

Try to achieve as much as possible. You will be notified of your accomplishments. You can also observe them in the main menu.

Whether you can get them all or not, depends on you :)

Good luck my friend!

-------- Controls --------

A-W-S to move the skeleton 

Mouse to look around

Left Click to interact
